original_text: According to the commandment of the Lord they were numbered by the hand of Moses, every one according to his service, and according to his burden: thus were they numbered of him, as the Lord commanded Moses.
korean_text: 그들이 할 일과 짐을 메는 일을 따라 모세에게 계수되었으되 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 그들이 계수되었더라

sentences.original_text: According to the commandment of the Lord
they were numbered by the hand of Moses
every one according to his service
thus were they numbered of him
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 그들은 그에 의해 계수되었습니다
